resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105871</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105871</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206792</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Early Virginia Religious Petitions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühe Virginia Fromme Petitionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pétitions Religieuses Tôt de la Virginie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Petições Religiosas Adiantadas De Virgínia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Petizioni Religiose Iniziali Della Virginia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόωρες θρησκευτικές αιτήσεις της Βιρτζίνια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peticiones Religiosas Tempranas De Virginia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents images of 423 petitions submitted to the Virginia legislature between 1774 and 1802. The petitions concern such topics as the historic debate over the separation of church and state, the rights of dissenters such as Quakers and Baptists, the sale and division of property in the established church, and the dissolution of unpopular vestries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Bilder von 423 Petitionen dar, die bei der 
Virginia Gesetzgebung zwischen 1774 und 1802 eingegeben werden. 
Die Petitionen betreffen solche Themen wie die historische 
Debatte über der Trennung der Kirche und des Zustandes, die Rechte 
von dissenters wie Quäkern und Baptisten, der Verkauf und die 
Abteilung der Eigenschaft in der hergestellten Kirche und die 
Auflösung der unpopulären Vestries.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente des images de 423 pétitions soumises à
la législature de la Virginie entre 1774 et 1802. Les 
pétitions concernent des sujets tels que la discussion historique 
au-dessus de la séparation de l'église et l'état, les droites des 
dissidents tels que des quakers et des baptistes, la vente et la 
division de la propriété dans l'église établie, et la dissolution 
des sacristies inpopulaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta imagens de 423 petições submetidas à 
legislatura de Virgínia entre 1774 e 1802. As petições 
concernem tópicos como o debate historic sobre a separação da 
igreja e o estado, as direitas dos dissenters tais como quakers e 
baptists, a venda e a divisão da propriedade na igreja estabelecida, 
e a dissolução de vestries unpopular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta lle immagini di 423 petizioni presentate 
alla legislatura della Virginia fra 1774 e 1802. Le petizioni 
interessano tali soggetti come il dibattito storico sopra la 
separazione della chiesa e dichiarano, i diritti dei dissenters 
quali i quakers e Battisti, la vendita e la divisione della 
proprietà nella chiesa stabilita e la dissoluzione dei vestries 
impopolari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει τις εικόνες 423 αιτήσεων που 
υποβάλλονται στο νομοθετικό σώμα της Βιρτζίνια μεταξύ 1774 και
1802. Οι αιτήσεις αφορούν τέτοια θέματα όπως την 
ιστορική συζήτηση πέρα από το χωρισμό της εκκλησίας και το 
κράτος, τα δικαιώματα των αποστατών όπως Quakers και 
Baptists, η πώληση και το τμήμα της ιδιοκτησίας στην 
καθιερωμένη εκκλησία, και η διάλυση των μη δημοφιλών 
σκευοφυλακίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta imágenes de 423 peticiones sometidas a 
la legislatura de Virginia entre 1774 y 1802. Las peticiones se 
refieren a los asuntos tales como el discusión histórico sobre la 
separación de la iglesia y estado, las derechas de dissenters tales 
como quakers y los Bautista, la venta y la división de la 
característica en la iglesia establecida, y la disolución de 
vestries impopulares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206792</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105871</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/early-virginia-religious-petitions</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
